isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - SIDE AND CORNER INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: SIDE AND CORNER INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Standard Cab for all Models

figure.caption: Figure 101. Passenger Side Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Standard Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. PASSENGER SIDE SIDE AND CORNER INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Remove passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat and/or fixed passenger bench seat, refer to SEATS .

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 101 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 5) from the cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side side and corner interior trim panel on standard cab.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat and/or fixed passenger bench seat, refer to SEATS .
If so equipped, remove bunk/storage unit from behind front seats, refer to EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT .

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 102 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove nine push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 5) from the cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 102. Passenger Side Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. PASSENGER SIDE SIDE AND CORNER INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side side and corner interior trim panel on extended cab.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove full width rear bench seat, refer to SEATS .

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 103 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side side and corner interior trim panel (Item 5) from the cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 103. Passenger Side Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Crew Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. PASSENGER SIDE SIDE AND CORNER INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side side and corner interior trim panel on crew cab.
